meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Cabana Andrea Irvin Jeremy Cohen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4000.

td.p: Michael Cabana, a pediatrician from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Andrea Irvin, a sales and marketing consultant from Hixon, Tennessee
Jeremy Cohen, a television producer from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,500)

tr.td: DRAMA & DRAMATISTS
CLASSIC TV EPISODES
(Alex: You have to identify the show.)
GOING TO THE DOGS
ROCKET SCIENCE
SIMILAR SAYINGS
OODLES OF FOODLES

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jeremy
Andrea
Michael
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
JeremyWho was Westinghouse

AndreaWho is Maytag?

MichaelWho is Edison?

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Summarizing the dawn of a new era, he came up with the slogan, "You press the button, we do the rest"')

tr.td: INVENTORS
Summarizing the dawn of a new era, he came up with the slogan, "You press the button, we do the rest"

Andrea
Michael
3rd place: trip to Coconut Grove, Florida & stay at Mayfair House
2nd place: trip to Cancun, Mexico by Yahoo! Travel
New champion: $13,800
Jeremy

Michael
